summary: Actresses talk about their personal lives and dealing with a balance between family responsibilities and being a professional actor.
cast: Jayne Atkinson|Paget Brewster|L. Scott Caldwell|Alicia Coppola|Roxanne Hart|Catherine Hicks|Roma Maffia|Donna Massetti|Cristine Rose
title: That Gal... Who Was in That Thing: That Guy 2
